author: vmassol
msg: Fixed bug in HttpServletRequestWrapper.include() where the passed request was not the original request. The problem was only apparent with Tomcat 3.x.

author: vmassol
msg: Added support for Tomcat 3.3.2 (note that this required adding the commons-logging jar to the Tomcat bootstrap classpath).

author: vmassol
msg: - Use only 1 aspect to intercept client side because had some issue with AW and different aspects plugging onto the same join point (problem was with ordering)
